thread.title: When Does a Couple Hit Peak Sexual Satisfaction?
thread.title_full: When Does a Couple Hit Peak Sexual Satisfaction? -- The Cut

author: The Cut
title: When Does a Couple Hit Peak Sexual Satisfaction?
text:
Is dating a lopsided numbers game in which women are screwed? We talk to Jon Birger, author of Dateonomics (who says, yes, totally). We also debate when in a relationship the sex is best (why does it take people so long to figure out how to fuck each other properly?) and whether it's possible to extract yourselves from a friends-with-benefits situation without kissing friendship good-bye. Join hosts Allison P. Davis, Maureen O'Connor, and David Wallace-Wells for this week's podcast.
A new episode of "Sex Lives" can be found each Wednesday on iTunes or SoundCloud.
